data.name: Wrap It !
data.description:
The frame of a painting is its protection towards reality.
`eptaceps said, 16/04/2020`

How philosophical i am...

Task

You are given a `string`, return it wrapped like the following! ``` a bb ccc ``` --> becomes --> ``` +-----+ | a | | bb | | ccc | +-----+ ``` The actual input --> `"a\nbb\nccc"`
The actual output -> `"+-----+\n| a |\n| bb |\n| ccc |\n+-----+"`
(If the string is empty, return an empty string)

Another example :

```python if a: print('True!') else: print('False!') ``` --> becomes --> ```python +---------------------+ | if a: | | print('True!') | | else: | | print('False!') | +---------------------+ ``` The actual input -> `"if a:\n print('True!')\nelse:\n print('False!')"`
The actual output -> `"+---------------------+\n| if a: |\n| print('True!') |\n| else: |\n| print('False!') |\n+---------------------+"` Input and output strings will be printed to console if not too long.
